message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000.  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $18,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth a premium. How about we meet in the middle at $19,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I am still not comfortable with $19,000. I would like to offer $17,500 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
